genresAdvancedInfo.name: classic konkani pop
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Classic Konkani Pop is a genre of music that originated in the Konkan region of India. It is a fusion of traditional Konkani music with pop and rock influences. The music is characterized by its upbeat rhythms, catchy melodies, and lively vocals. The lyrics often reflect the joys and struggles of life in the Konkan region.
